local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle local Debris = game:GetService("Debris") local Anims = {'RightSlash', 'OverHeadSwing', 'SwordSpin'} --,"LeftSlash"
local UnsheathSound = Instance.new("Sound") UnsheathSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\unsheath.wav" UnsheathSound.Parent = Sword UnsheathSound.Volume = .5
-- CONSTANTS --
local BASE_DMG = 7 local SLASH_DMG = 15 local SPIN_ATTACK_DMG = 10 local SWING_DMG = 20 local Damage = BASE_DMG
function WaitFor(parent, name) while true do local child = parent:FindFirstChild(name) if child ~= nil then return child end wait() end end
WaitFor(Tool,"RunAnim") local Sparkles = WaitFor(Sword,"Sparkles")
function OnSwordHit(hit) if Tool.Enabled then return end
if hit.Parent then local hitHumanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local character = Tool.Parent if character and hitHumanoid then local player = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(character) if player then local humanoid = character:findFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and hitHumanoid ~= humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then local rightArm = character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm then local joint = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if joint and (joint.Part0 == Sword or joint.Part1 == Sword) then TagHumanoid(hitHumanoid, player) hitHumanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) end end end end end if hit.Name=="Handle" then Sparkles.Enabled=true wait(.3) Sparkles.Enabled=false end end end
function TagHumanoid(hitHumanoid, player) for i,v in ipairs(hitHumanoid:GetChildren()) do if v.Name=="creator" then v:remove() end end local creator_tag=Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value=player creator_tag.Name="creator" creator_tag.Parent=hitHumanoid Debris:AddItem(creator_tag,1) end
Tool.Enabled = true
function OnActivated() if Tool.Enabled then Tool.Enabled = false local character = Tool.Parent local hitHumanoid = character.Humanoid
if not hitHumanoid then print("Humanoid not found") return end
local newAnim = Anims[math.random(1,#Anims)]
while newAnim == Tool.RunAnim.Value do newAnim = Anims[math.random(1,#Anims)] end
-- value changed, sends callback to local script Tool.RunAnim.Value = newAnim
if newAnim == 'OverHeadSwing' then Damage = SWING_DMG wait(1) elseif newAnim == 'SwordSpin' then Damage = SPIN_ATTACK_DMG wait(1) else Damage = SLASH_DMG end
wait(.75) Damage = BASE_DMG Tool.Enabled = true end end
function OnEquipped() UnsheathSound:play() Sparkles.Enabled = false end
Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped)
connection = Sword.Touched:connect(OnSwordHit)
